snippet.title: Resident Evil 2: Source V. 1
snippet.description:
After 4 years in development, the first full (alpha) version of RE2:S is ready to play!

V 1.04 Standalone Lite (ModDB): https://www.moddb.com/mods/resident-evil-2-source/downloads/resident-evil-2-source-v-103-standalone

V 1.04 Standalone (Itch Io one quarter GB smaller Edition) - https://bloodwraith777.itch.io/re2source

V 1.04 Standalone (GDrive): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1kTBh5pGZDOOH91zJFGJBy3DrAOkRegBA/view?usp=sharing

V 1.03 Standalone [With fixed bat file] (GDrive): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1GSxtlZfPUN6Ej_kzxAOGmDcUMaKz6ZK_/view?usp=sharing

V 1.04 Standalone (Dropbox): https://www.dropbox.com/s/zcdsdy8kg91jka5/Resident%20Evil%202%20Source%201_04_Standalone.rar?dl=0

V 1.04 Standalone/Lite (Internet Archive) https://archive.org/details/resident-evil-2-source-v-1-04-standalone

V 1.04 Standalone Lite (Patreon) https://www.patreon.com/posts/resident-evil-2-120064863

Older versions:

V 1.02 (ModDB): https://www.moddb.com/mods/resident-evil-2-source/downloads/resident-evil-2-source-demo-v-11


STANDALONE INSTALL: Extract the Resident Evil 2 Source folder to any location. To launch, simply run RE2Source.bat located in the Base folder. Feel free to make a shortcut to that bat file.

NON-STANDALONE V 1.02 INSTALL:

(Only V 1.02 seems to work as a non-standalone install, when I try to move the standalone version of the RE2 folder to sourcemods and launch it via Steam, the vpks fail to mount and I'm tired of figuring this Source engine BS out. I'm only supporting the standalone version from now on. Nobody ever wants to help me, and working with the Source engine is *literally* butting your head against a brick wall.)

 Only Steam and Source SDK Base 2013 Singleplayer are required to play for the non-standalone version. Installation: Extract the RE2 folder and move it to C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\sourcemods OR C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\sourcemods if you are using a 64 bit OS, and restart Steam if it's already running. Source SDK Base 2013 Singleplayer will automatically install upon launch if it isn't already installed.
